title: Batman - The Black Mirror (2011) (Digital TPB) (Zone-Empire)
description:
Scott Snyder pens this awesome recent Batman story which then laid the groundwork for his Court of Owls storyline, with terrific art by Jock. Promotional info for the collected edition - "In "The Black Mirror," a series of brutal murders pushes Batman's detective skills to the limit and forces him to confront one of Gotham City's oldest evils. Helpless and trapped in the deadly Mirror House, Batman must fight for his life against one of Gotham City's oldest and most powerful evils!"

This is the high-res digital edition of the TPB by Zone-Empire, who also previously released a low-res copy as well. Thanks to them for their efforts, please seed and enjoy! :-)
